titles.title: A resolution congratulating Fermi National Accelerator Laboratory on 50 years of groundbreaking discoveries.
A resolution congratulating Fermi National Accelerator Laboratory on 50 years of groundbreaking discoveries.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Congratulates the Fermi National Accelerator Laboratory (Fermilab) on its semicentennial.
Wishes Fermilab success in continuing to help the people of the United States understand the mysteries of matter, energy, space, and time.
